A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Best Star Wars movie to date\, fanboys get over yourselves and enjoy the movie for what it is. It was a great movie that had my jaw on the floor and very unexpected moments. Still borrowed heavily from ESB and ROTJ but it paves the way for something entirely new. The original trilogy was not without its flaws and people need to put their expectations and wants for this film away\, bc it’s wrong to hate something that just because it was the film you expected it to be.
